text:
This has been incredibly difficult the last 6 months, with Covid-19 and all of the pressure I have received from the recruiting industry. 

My team and I spoke with some high level officials recently. 

Go Dawgs ❗

#RiseAboveHate https://t.co/u7aUl6NRyc
